text: Leptocyrtinus uniformis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1943. It is known from Samoa.BioLib.cz - Leptocyrtinus uniformis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Cyrtinini Category:Beetles described in 1943
title: Leptocyrtinus uniformis
